app.title: MediaVault
app.description: Your personal media library for videos, audiobooks, and ebooks

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
items: MediaVault is your personal media library for videos, audiobooks, and ebooks.
Start by scanning a directory to import your media files.
Use the sidebar to filter and search through your library.
Click any media item to view details, play, or edit metadata.

scanning.title: Scanning & Importing
items: Click 'Scan Directory' in the header to select a folder to scan.
Scanning detects video, audio, and ebook files automatically.
Large directories are scanned progressively â€” you can browse while scanning.
Rescan anytime to pick up new or changed files.
Import data from external sources using the Import button.

browsing.title: Browsing Your Library
items: Your media appears in a grid view with thumbnail previews.
Click a video to open the player, or right-click for more options.
Use the search bar to find media by filename or metadata.
Sort by name, date, size, or duration using the toolbar.
The library uses virtual scrolling for smooth performance with large collections.

filtering.title: Filtering & Search
items: Open the Filters panel from the sidebar to apply advanced filters.
Filter by file type, duration, file size, quality, and date.
Combine multiple filters for precise results.
Save filter combinations as presets for quick access.
Use the Presets manager to create, edit, and apply saved presets.

tagging.title: Tags & Categories
items: Add tags to any media item for easy organization.
Browse all tags on the Tags page (accessible from the header).
Use bulk operations to tag multiple items at once.
Categories are extracted from file paths and can be customized.
Import tags from external sources using the tag importer.

focusMode.title: Focus Mode
items: Focus Mode provides a dedicated interface for organizing a single video.
Preview the video, edit categories, and batch rename from one screen.
Access Focus Mode by clicking the focus icon on any video card.
Use the category editor to assign and customize categories.
Batch rename files with pattern-based rules.

duplicates.title: Duplicate Detection
items: Access the Duplicates page from the header to find duplicate files.
Duplicates are detected by file hash, name similarity, and file size.
Compare duplicates side-by-side to decide which to keep.
Use batch operations to clean up multiple duplicates at once.

mediaTypes.title: Media Types
items: VideoVault supports videos, audiobooks, and ebooks.
Videos play in a built-in player with full controls.
Audiobooks have a dedicated player with chapter navigation.
Ebooks (EPUB/PDF) open in a built-in reader with page navigation.
Switch between media types using the tabs in the library view.

analytics.title: Analytics & Stats
items: View library statistics on the Analytics page.
See format distribution, storage usage, and library growth.
Track your most-watched content and watch time.
Monitor your library size and composition over time.

settings.title: Settings
items: Access settings from the gear icon in the header.
Configure scan preferences and thumbnail quality.
Set display preferences and default sort order.
Manage library paths and auto-scan scheduling.
Toggle between light and dark themes.
